Tip.Title: Welcome to the SDLTM Anonymizer view
Tip.Description: The SDLTM Anonymizer view is where you anonymize data in the both server and file-based Translation Memories. Includes features to anonymize content within Segments, System Fields and Custom Fields.

Tip.Title: Working with Content Filtering Rules
Tip.Description: Select, edit, delete or add new rules to match personal data in the Translation Unit segments to be anonymized.

Tip.Title: Working with System Fields
Tip.Description: Substitute the Users Name values that are recovered from the System Fields in the Translation Memory with new values.

Tip.Title: Working with Custom Fields
Tip.Description: Substitute the values that are recovered for each of the Custom Field types in the Translation Memory with new values.
